snippet.title: Being and Becoming | Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show June 2022
snippet.description:
Being and Becoming is a subterranean roguelike where you play as a Lucid Dreamer in a world of endless slumber.

This gameplay trailer for the game was first shown at the Future Game Show 2022. 

Don’t sleep on Being and Becoming, which is coming soon to PC.

Our Socials - YouTube: www.youtube.com/GamesRadar
Twitter: www.twitter.com/FutureGamesShow
Facebook: www.facebook.com.GamesRadar
Twitch: www.twitch.tv/GamesRadar
